DOC.brief_title: Changes in Everydaylife Activity of Children With CP During HABIT-ILE
DOC.detailed_description: Studying in a RCT the changes in everyday llife activities of children with CP (unilateral and bilateral) during HABIT-ILE or control period, changes being scored by parents and by experts on ABILHAND-Kids, the PEDI, the ACTIVLM-CP and the COPM. Investigate neuroplastic changes and correlation with everyday life changes.
DOC.criteria: cerebral palsy ability to make a few steps with a walking device ability to pick a light object from a table with the more affected hand ability to understand simple games no active seizure no botulinum toxin in the 6 months previous to the intervention or during intervention time major visual deficit
